version_description:
- Hero amiibo Figure (Super Smash Bros. Series) support
- Joker amiibo Figure (Super Smash Bros. Series) support
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

- Added amiibo game usage information
- Added Super Smash Bros. Ultimate amiibo game data (Level, Experience, Attack and Defence)
- Added Midna & Wolf Link amiibo game data (Level and number of hearts)

We are thrilled to release Ally version 2.0. This update introduces a lot of changes, including games. Now you can browse through all the games that support amiibo and see what each amiibo will give you.
